name: The Grimoire's Crusade
description:
The Stars in the sky got stolen, thankfully a group of brave explorers will go on a crusade to find them. You and your discord group will have to embark on a journey with help of a grimoire passed on for generations, with this book you must solve the secrets hidden within the evil lairs of the monsters who stole your precious night sky. Good luck, adventurers.

The Grimoire's Crusade was developed for the GGJ 2021

The game is a multiplayer puzzle adventure. All player must work together to complete a series of puzzles and survive hordes of enemies.

All players need to work together to conquer rooms filled with enemies and puzzles.

One of the players, the wizard, will be tasked with a legendary grimoire that contains the answers of the puzzles.

The rest of the players, the knights, must protect the wizard and fight fierceful enemies.

2 - 4 Players

External voice chat is required to play the game
